department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal to acquire a composite reflector mold pattern
description: A supplier is needed for a layup pattern (master pattern/plug) to manufacture composite reflector molds for the CHORD observatory.
tags: Canada - BC - TRS Contract - CHORD Composite Reflector Mold
full_summary:
# solicitud : 31034-239797 - CHORD Composite Reflector Mold Pattern

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) and the Dominion Radio Astrophysical Observatory (DRAO) is inviting Supplier to participate in this competitive bidding process. The Government of Canada invites Suppliers to submit a proposal for the acquisition and delivery of a CHORD composite reflector mold pattern layup (also referred to as the "master pattern" or "plug").

# Description of the Requirement
The NRC requires a single master mold pattern, specifically for the fabrication of composite reflector molds, for the CHORD system. The supplier is required to provide the necessary technical specifications, documentation, and delivery details. The end user, NRC, is interested in acquiring this composite reflector mold pattern layup to support the CHORD project.

# Information on the Procurement
* Title: 31034-239797 - CHORD Composite Reflector Mold Pattern
* Competition Type: Competitive Renewal
* Contract Value:
* The contract is a Term Contract, with expected contract date from *2023-03-32 to March 31, 2024
* The procurement may be subject to Trade Agreements, including Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
* Regions of Delivery:
	+ Region of Delivery: British Columbia
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ City: Gatineau
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada
